feed.title: GitHub Perl Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Perl in GitHub

entry.title: byrnereese/mt-plugin-autoprefs
entry.summary:
A plugin for Movable Type that makes it easy to encapsulate and apply a set of blog preferences to a blog.

Please note: the Auto Preferences plugin has been merged into [Config Assistant 2.0](http://github.com/endevver/mt-plugin-config-assistant]. All users are recommended to upgrade to Config Assistant 2.0 or greater and remove Auto Preferences from their installation.

Melody Users

Melody users have no need for this plugin as Config Assistant has been integrated into the core application (and this plugin along with it).

entry.title: dbolser/GCal-Upcoming
entry.summary:
The aim is to email myself a list of all events in my calendar(s), along with 'days until...', to help me plan for upcoming events better.

BROKEN AND CAN'T BE FIXED!

Minimally working version

For installing deps, see: http://goo.gl/iiYns

For more info, see: http://goo.gl/BZQw8

TODO:

  1. Handle all day vs. specifc appointments better (calculation of 'days until' needs to take the difference into account). Trivial to do, I just ain't done it yet.

  2. Handle multi-day events better (currently there is no end date given, and the 'days until' goes negative during the event). Again, should be easy.

  3. Allow calendar information to be put in a config file.

  4. Support multiple calendars properly.
